metadata.title: CVE-2021-47151 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:interconnect: qcom: bcm-voter: add a missing of_node_put() Add a missingof_node_put() in of_bcm_voter_get() to avoid the reference leak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
